column1: Apple and Microsoft should be hiring Americans instead of importing street shitters from India while simultaneously outsourcing American IT jobs to them.
I HATE APPLE. SHAZAM WILL REQUIRE YOU TO VERIFY WITH CREDIT CARD IF APPLE BUY IT!!!!

Rabinowitz Shekelstein Well, if only Americans did half as good as a job and for 5 times cheaper, maybe then Apple and Microsoft would give jobs to Americans instead of “diarrhea infested dot heads”. Just a thought.
What!?!?! So they basically just paid 400 million for a stone wheel?
